main.greeting: Components and accessories for you, your bike, bikepacking, touring, and commuting
product.topcap.annotation: We don't include bolts with your order by default! You likely already have at least one. But if you're unsure whether yours will fit, or simply want more, let us know when ordering, and we'll include a couple for free. The black steel bolt is made of hardened steel and may rust over time!
product.topcap.option.box.label: Gift kraft box (free)
product.topcap.option.box.description: If you're getting a topcap as a gift — we'll pack it. If it's for yourself, there's probably no need to create extra waste. But if you want one — just let us know, and we’ll put the cap in a box
form.comment_placeholder: Ask us a question or clarify order details
form.order_comment_placeholder: Ask a question or clarify order details
cart.delivery_cost: Delivery cost is not included in the total. We will calculate it and contact you after placing the order.
success.title: Thank you for your order!
success.description: Your order has been successfully placed. We will contact you shortly via email to confirm all details
notFound.title: Oops, it seems this page does not exist
